entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Killarney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:51 a.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 6. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. High 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Windy. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Windy. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. High 6. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
